price: ߡߍ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ ߟߋ߫ ߛߎ߬ߟߊ߫ ߓߣߐ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߟߋ߫
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-khāsirūna
